phrases.phrase: Your database version is up to date
You should install/update the IP database from the [IP Geo Location] Manager that you can find in the Plugins section.

IP database of the current version of the IPgeo Plugin needs to be updated. An update will be downloaded from the Flynax Server and imported to your site local database.
Updating may take a few minutes; click the Install button and stay on the page until the process is over.
You may check for the IP database updated by clicking the Update button, the process may take a few minutes, please stay on the page until the process isn't over.
Do not update the database if you have custom IPs or if your database targets a particular country or a few countries only.
There are too many failed requests received from the server, please try again later or contact Flynax Support.
